name: F1 Racing Championship
overview: Strap yourself in for high-octane excitement in F1 RACING CHAMPIONSHIP for Game Boy Color. The goal of this game is to provide a realistic Formula 1 racing experience in every aspect: the game has the full F1 license, which gives you a choice of 11 real racing teams such as McLaren and Ferrari. Choose the vehicle that suits your racing style, then take to one of 16 real licensed tracks, each accurately modeled to reflect its real-life counterpart. You can play in multiple gameplay modes, including a quick Single Race or the more grueling Formula 1 Championship. Watch the action from several camera angles, including a behind the vehicle view and first-person perspective. The full color graphics contain large, detailed vehicles and smoothly animated tracks that help to put your right in the middle of the action. As an added bonus, try to prove your championship skills by taking on a friend with the link cable Two-Player mode. F1 RACING CHAMPIONSHIP is only compatible with Game Boy Color systems.
